ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have recorded all things in writing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have kept account of everything in a book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And everything have We recorded in a Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: However, We have recorded everything in a book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We have kept recorded everything in a Book, accounted for.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And all things We have recorded in a Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We have recorded everything in a book,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and everything We have numbered in a Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Everything have We recorded in a Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but We have recorded everything in a Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And everything We have recorded in a book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and We have figured everything in a Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And all things have We preserved on record.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And all things We have recorded in a Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and everything We have numbered in a Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But We have enumerated everything in writing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But all things We have enumerated in writing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:29] and everything, in the way of deeds, have We kept count of, have We recorded precisely, in a Book, as [individual] written records in the Preserved Tablet, in order to requite [creatures] in accordance with them, including [the record of] their denial of the Qur’ān.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Everything) regarding the works of the children of Adam (have We recorded in a Book) We wrote it down in the Guarded or Preserved Tablet.
